scripts.after-start: npm run checkers && npm run test && npm run watcher && npm run stop-test-setup
scripts.after-start-no-watcher: npm run checkers && npm run test && npm run stop-test-setup
scripts.all: CLIENT=openethereum npm run before-start && npm run start-test-setup-openethereum && npm run after-start
scripts.all-nethermind: CLIENT=nethermind npm run before-start && npm run start-test-setup-nethermind && npm run after-start
scripts.all-nethermind-no-watcher: CLIENT=nethermind npm run before-start && npm run start-test-setup-nethermind && npm run after-start-no-watcher
scripts.before-start: npm i && npm run get-all-submodules && npm run cleanup && npm run compile-posdao-contracts && npm run make-spec
scripts.cleanup: bash scripts/stop-test-setup && rm -rf ./accounts ./config ./data && git checkout ./accounts && git checkout ./config && git checkout ./data
scripts.compile-posdao-contracts: cd ./posdao-contracts && npm i && npm run compile
